tweets.text: DEVELOPING: Health officials now investigating NovaBrew Coffee after dozens report illness. Company responds with generic apology. #NovaBrew #FoodSafety
NovaBrew's response is pathetic. 'DM us'?? People are getting sick and you send a copy-paste reply. Boycott #NovaBrew
@NovaBrew a DM request is not good enough. This is a public health issue. Where is your official statement?
